content:
<ce:simple-para view="all">Synthesis of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> and <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>: A solution of H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>bdc (0.033<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O was adjusted to approximately pH 6 with dilute NaOH solution. Then btb (0.039<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH was added. This mixture was added to one side of the “H-shape” tube, and Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.060<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) or Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.062<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in 20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL water was added to the other side of the “H-shape” tube. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> and <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> were obtained in 76% yield (0.078<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g) for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> and 83% yield (0.075<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g) for <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> after one month. Anal. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">9</ce:inf>Zn (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>): C, 37.55; H, 5.12; N, 16.42. Found: C, 37.42; H, 5.01; N, 16.29%. Anal. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">38</ce:inf>Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">17</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>): C, 31.77; H, 4.22; N, 9.26. Found: C, 31.65; H, 4.14; N, 9.13%.</ce:simple-para>
clean_text: Synthesis of 1 and 2: A solution of H2bdc (0.033g, 0.2mmol) in 10mL H2O was adjusted to approximately pH 6 with dilute NaOH solution. Then btb (0.039g, 0.2mmol) in 10mL CH3OH was added. This mixture was added to one side of the "H-shape" tube, and Zn(NO3)2 ⋅6H2O (0.060g, 0.2mmol) or Cd(NO3)⋅3H2O (0.062g, 0.2mmol) in 20mL water was added to the other side of the "H-shape" tube. Colorless crystals of 1 and 2 were obtained in 76% yield (0.078g) for 1 and 83% yield (0.075g) for 2 after one month. Anal. Calc. for C16H26N6O9Zn (1): C, 37.55; H, 5.12; N, 16.42. Found: C, 37.42; H, 5.01; N, 16.29%. Anal. Calc. for C24H38Cd2N6O17 (2): C, 31.77; H, 4.22; N, 9.26. Found: C, 31.65; H, 4.14; N, 9.13%.
